name: 蔣榮
objective: 本課程為大地工程領域之核心必修課，旨在培養學生具備基礎工程分析與設計所需之基本知識與能力。課程內容涵蓋地質調查、基礎承載力分析、側向土壓力理論、擋土牆設計、淺基礎與深基礎之分析與設計、邊坡穩定，以及基礎施工與監測技術等。
schedule:
Week1: Introduction
Week2: Site Investigation and Monitoring (1)
Week3: Site Investigation and Monitoring (2)
Week4: Shallow Foundation (1)
Week5: Shallow Foundation (2)
Week6: Shallow Foundation (3)
Week7: Mat Foundation
Week8: Retaining Structure (1)
Week9: Retaining Structure (2)
Week10: Retaining Structure (3)
Week11: Midterm Exam
Week12: Sheet Pile Walls
Week13: Deep Excavation (Braced Cuts)
Week14: Pile Foundation (1)
Week15: Pile Foundation (2)
Week16: Slope Stability (1)
Week17: Slope Stability (2)
Week18: Final Exam
scorePolicy:
Participation: 20%
Assignments: 20%
Midterm Exam: 30%
Final Exam: 30%
materials: B. M. Das, Principles of Foundation Engineering, 8th ed, Thomson,  ISBN: 978049566812
consultation: Office hours: Anytime the instructor is in the office (or by appointment).
課程對應SDGs指標: SDG4：優質教育（Quality Education）SDG9：產業創新與基礎設施（Industry, Innovation and Infrastructure）SDG11：永續城市與社區（Sustainable Cities and Communities）
課程是否導入AI: ● 鼓勵學生使用生成式 AI 工具（Encourage students to use generative AI tools）
